templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to chat via our website or submit the email form here: https://www.backcountry.com/service/bc-help-center Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Orders placed before 3pm MST will generally ship the same day. Once shipped it will take 3-5 business days for standard shipping, or 5-10 business days for economy shipping.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/backcountry/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/Backcountry

templates.name: Rewards program
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.backcountry.com/expeditionperks

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: We have highly successful affiliate programs! Email affiliates@backcountry.com for more information.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.backcountry.com/service/bc-returnguarantee

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please reach out to our customer support team via chat, phone or email here: https://www.backcountry.com/service/bc-help-center Let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.name: Sizing (clothes)
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! The fit of our clothes depends on the manufacturer, but we have a size chart on each product page to help you find the perfect size. Would you mind sharing your usual size?

templates.name: Group sales
templates.content: Our Group Sales team is focused on delivering a client service relationship to customers in both the public and private sectors. We'll work one-on-one with you to find you the best product for your needs at a competitive price. Find out more here: https://www.backcountry.com/Store/content/groupSalesContact.jsp

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.backcountry.com/account/order-history

templates.name: Referral program
templates.content: We have a referral program where you can give friends $20 off their first order and get $20 when they purchase. Check it out here: https://www.backcountry.com/customer/referral

templates.name: Discount exclusions
templates.content: Some items are not eligible for discounts depending on the manufacturer or if they are special orders, package discounts, gift certificates, passes and lift tickets. You can find more exclusion details here: https://www.backcountry.com/sc/new-customer-coupon-rules

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.backcountry.com/sc/retail-stores

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We have an exclusive 20% discount on select full-price purchases for healthcare workers, first responders, teachers, military, and government employees. Simply verify through ID.me here to become eligible for your discount: https://www.backcountry.com/sc/id-me-program

templates.name: Price matching
templates.content:
If a competitor has an item available online at a lower final price (after any tax and shipping costs), we will beat the product price by 5% with some conditions:
- The item must be in stock and the price must be currently listed.
- The item must be sold by a U.S.-based online retailer authorized by the brand. Auction sites excluded.
- The item must be identical and in new condition (same size, color, model year).

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-800-409-4502 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $69. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: You can take a look at our full warranty policy here: https://www.backcountry.com/service/bc-returnguarantee#warranty

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can initiate your return here: https://returns.narvar.com/backcountry/returns?locale=en_US

templates.name: Does the free returns mean no $8.99 return shipping cost?
templates.content: If you choose to receive your refund in store credit, the $8.99 fee for the FedEx shipping label will be waived. You can see our detailed return/exchange policy here: http://bctxt.co/afg9y66jqUtD

templates.name: Code won't work
templates.content: Please note that discounts are not valid on certain manufacturer-restricted items, including bikes and frames, digital cameras, any item with GPS technology, personal locator beacons, strollers, ski and snowboard equipment, airbag packs, fishing gear, and watercraft. You can learn more here: https://www.backcountry.com/sc/new-customer-coupon-rules?srsltid=AfmBOopX3EbU5igksrFl3cuEGqJksvZkY574I-GnqIPq3Dpr5rdNUuG8
